entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
